department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.en: This course is primarily for sophomores in the Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering (DBSE). In conjunction with the independent study course of the department, it briefly introduces the commonly used instruments for biomedical research. Therefore, students can correctly select and operate appropriate scientific instruments for their research.
goal.ch: 此課程授課對象為生醫科學與工程學系大二學生，配合本系專題研究課程，概略性介紹研究常用的儀器，讓學生在進行專題研究過程中，能正確選擇及使用適當科學儀器。

content.en:
An Overview of Instrumental Analysis
An Overview of Measurement Basics
Atomic Spectroscopy (I)
Atomic Spectroscopy (II)
Optical Spectroscopy (I)
Optical Spectroscopy (II)
Optical Spectroscopy (III)
Mid-term Exam
Cell Analysis Instruments (I)
Cell Analysis Instruments (II)
Cell Analysis Instruments (III)
Separation Methods (I)
Separation Methods (II)
Electroanalytical Chemistry
Electron Microscope
Final Exam
content.ch:
儀器分析概述
基本檢測概述
原子光譜分析相關儀器 (I)
原子光譜分析相關儀器 (II)
光學檢測分析相關儀器 (I)
光學檢測分析相關儀器 (II)
光學檢測分析相關儀器 (III)
期中考試
細胞檢測分析相關儀器 (I)
細胞檢測分析相關儀器 (II)
細胞檢測分析相關儀器 (III)
分離方法相關儀器 (I)
分離方法相關儀器 (II)
電分析化學相關儀器
電子顯微鏡
期末考試

textbook.en: Douglas A. Skoog, F. James Holler, Stanley R. Crouch, “Principles of Instrumental Analysis”, Cengage Learning, 2017 (ISBN: 9781305577213)
textbook.ch: Douglas A. Skoog, F. James Holler, Stanley R. Crouch, “Principles of Instrumental Analysis”, Cengage Learning, 2017 (ISBN: 9781305577213)

method.ch: 講授 研討 其他

grading.en: Class participation 30% Assignment 0 % In-class presentation 20% Exam 40% Attendance 10%
grading.ch: 課堂表現 30% 作業 0% 課中報告 20% 考試 40% 出席率 10%

domain.en: 計算分析領域 、 生醫生化技術領域 、 材料科學 、 基礎醫學 、 轉譯醫學
domain.ch: 計算分析領域 、 生醫生化技術領域 、 材料科學 、 基礎醫學 、 轉譯醫學

en.competency: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning

ch.competency: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
ch.Assessments: 出席/課堂表現 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習
